channel.title: Scrum on Tobias Bayer
channel.description: Recent content in Scrum on Tobias Bayer

item.title: Suggested Reading
item.description:
I’m going to post some links to interesting articles here every now and then. Here’s the first bunch:

Scrum and Kanban: both the same, only different
A nice comparison between Scrum and Kanban.

Why Software Projects are Terrible and How Not To Fix Them
Best practices alone cannot make a difference.

Introduction to Blocks in Objective-C
A really comprehensive explanation of blocks in Objective-C.
